Galleries built off the stern quarter often had “Seats of ease” for the officers.

author: Rick Spilman
content:
The heads are on the beakhead, just forward of where the image ends. If you look closely on the port side, you can see the edge of one of the seats, painted yellow, through the access behind the netting.
